title: WhatsApp launches 'Strict Account Settings': How to enable the new lockdown-style mode?
snippet: Meta introduced Strict account settings on WhatsApp, providing extreme protections against cyber attacks for users at risk, such as journalists. This feature limits media from non-contacts and restricts calls and group additions, but may degrade the messaging experience.

title: UK Pledges AI Training for All to Grasp $193 Billion Opportunity
snippet: Technology Secretary Liz Kendall promised to offer training in artificial intelligence for all UK workers as the government seeks to embrace a technology that it said has the potential to boost economic output by £140 billion ($193 billion) a year.

title: Elon Musk says 'WhatsApp is not secure' amid Meta privacy lawsuit; Sridhar Vembu cites 'conflict of interest'
snippet: A lawsuit against Meta alleges false privacy claims regarding WhatsApp, asserting that user conversations can be accessed. Meta has dismissed the allegations. Executives of rival firms, Elon Musk and Sridhar Vembu, reacted to the lawsuits.&nbsp;

title: C3.AI in talks to merge with startup Automation Anywhere: Report

title: OpenAI's Sam Altman tells employees 'ICE is going too far' after Minnesota killings
snippet: Federal agents shot and killed a protester in Minneapolis over the weekend, the second such shooting this month, sparking widespread disapproval of the Immigration and Customs Enforcement's actions. More than 60 CEOs have signed a statement calling ‌for de-escalation after ‌weeks of silence.

title: TikTok faces app deletions, censorship claims, glitches in days after ownership change
snippet: Censorship claims, technical problems and a report of a surge in app deletions are just some of the challenges TikTok is facing as it adjusts to a new ownership structure in the United States that was finalized last week.

title: Amazon to close Amazon Go, Amazon Fresh stores, focus on Whole Foods and online grocery delivery
snippet: The Seattle-based online retailer said Tuesday in a blog post that it plans to convert some of those soon-to-be shuttered locations into Whole Foods Market stores. The company operates 57 Amazon Fresh stores and 15 Amazon Go stores.

title: Anthropic hikes 2026 revenue forecast 20%: Report
snippet: Anthropic ⁠has raised its revenue ‌forecasts ‌for ‌the next several years, projecting sales to ​quadruple ​this year ‌to ‍as ‍much as $18 billion and reach $55 ‌billion next year, The Information reported on ‍Tuesday.

title: Oracle says data center outage causing issues faced by US TikTok users
snippet: Oracle on Tuesday said issues faced by US users of social ⁠media app TikTok are the result of a temporary weather-related power outage at an Oracle data center, after California Governor Gavin Newsom linked the issues to what he called the suppression of content critical of President Donald ‌Trump.

title: Amazon bungles Wednesday layoff plan with misfired internal email
snippet: Amazon ‍on Tuesday appeared ​to have mistakenly alerted many Amazon ⁠Web Services cloud computing employees about layoffs planned for Wednesday morning with a commiseration email and ‌team-wide meeting ‌invite sent hours early.

title: Stratospheric internet could finally start taking off this year
snippet: Today, an estimated 2.2 billion people still have either limited or no access to the internet, largely because they live in remote places.
